oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Convict Labor #1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Military, Strikes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Soldiers keeping strikers away from convicts employed in dismantling their homes. Second Panel: Armed strikers marching the convicts and their guards to the railroad. Third Panel: Tennessee governor leading a special session of legislature.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
